name: Astrum Ludum
description:
A short VN made for the Ludum Dare 46
As a Junior scientist, you are in charge of the growth of an unknown plant species from Neptune. It could lead to a major scientific discovery, so try your best to keep it alive.

Made by:

Dje Ricane: Dev // AmePalacroix: Dev & 2D Artist // Ma’ari: 2D Artist // Loma: 3D Artist // Abygaïl: Story Writing
